sql: select m.* from (select '技术通知' as wjfl,t.no as jcbh, t.name as jcmc, t.url as wjlj, t.creator as scry, t.cjsj as scsj,expire_date as yxqx2,(select lrr from zxjc_t_jstc_scx where jcbh = t.no and rownum < 2) as fpr,(select lrsj from zxjc_t_jstc_scx where jcbh = t.no and rownum < 2) as fpsj,'N' as fpflg,(select count(id) from zxjc_t_jstc_scx where  jcbh = t.no) as sffp from ZSDL_JSTZ@ln_pdm98 t where t.status = '已发布' and t.release_dept like '通机%' and t.lx = 'JSTZ' and to_date(t.expire_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= trunc(sysdate)) m where m.sffp = 0
sql_cnt: select count(m.jcbh) from (select t.no as jcbh, t.name as jcmc, t.url as wjlj, t.creator as scry, t.cjsj as scsj,expire_date as yxqx2,(select lrr from zxjc_t_jstc_scx where jcbh = t.no and rownum < 2) as fpr,(select lrsj from zxjc_t_jstc_scx where jcbh = t.no and rownum < 2) as fpsj,'N' as fpflg,(select count(id) from zxjc_t_jstc_scx where  jcbh = t.no) as sffp from ZSDL_JSTZ@ln_pdm98 t where t.status = '已发布' and t.release_dept like '通机%' and t.lx = 'JSTZ' and to_date(t.expire_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= trunc(sysdate)) m where m.sffp = 0
sql_orderby: order by m.scsj desc nulls last
